titleStmt.title: S. Mary Magdalens pilgrimage to paradise. Wherein are liuely imprinted the foote-steps of her excellent vertues, for sinners to follow, who desire to accompany her thither. / By I.S. of Society of Iesvs.
titleStmt.author: Sweetnam, John, 1581-1622.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
